mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_CONTENT ( GAME_TITLE, GAME_TARGET_LEVEL, GAME_PRICE, GAME_DISCOUNT_PRICE, GAME_CONTENT, GAME_COUNT, GAME_SUB_startDATE, GAME_SUB_ENDDATE GAME_SUB_REGDATE, GAME_SUB_ENDDATE, DEL_CHECK ) VALUES ( #{game_title}, #{game_target_level}, #{game_price}, #{game_discount_price}, #{game_content}, #{game_count}, #{game_sub_startDate}, #{game_sub_endDate}, #{del_check} )

SELECT MAX(GAME_NO) FROM GAME_CONTENT WHERE GAME_TITLE = #{game_title}
INSERT INTO UPLOAD ( FILENAME, FILEPATH, UUID, GAME_NO, GAME_TITLE )VALUES( #{fileName}, #{filepath}, #{uuid}, #{game_no}, #{game_title} )
mapper.select: SELECT G.GAME_NO, G.GAME_TITLE, G.GAME_TARGET_LEVEL, G.GAME_DISCOUNT_PRICE, G.GAME_COUNT, G.GAME_REGDATE, U.FILENAME, U.FILEPATH, U.UUID, G.DEL_CHECK FROM GAME_CONTENT AS G LEFT JOIN UPLOAD U ON G.GAME_NO = U.GAME_NO WHERE U.FILENAME IS NOT NULL AND G.DEL_CHECK = "Y" ORDER BY G.GAME_NO DESC limit #{criteria.pageStart}, #{criteria.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM GAME_CONTENT WHERE DEL_CHECK = "Y"

SELECT G.GAME_NO, G.GAME_TITLE, G.GAME_TARGET_LEVEL, G.GAME_DISCOUNT_PRICE, G.GAME_COUNT, G.GAME_REGDATE, U.FILENAME, U.FILEPATH, U.UUID, G.DEL_CHECK FROM GAME_CONTENT AS G LEFT JOIN UPLOAD U ON G.GAME_NO = U.GAME_NO WHERE U.FILENAME IS NOT NULL AND G.DEL_CHECK = "N" ORDER BY G.GAME_NO DESC limit #{criteria.pageStart}, #{criteria.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM GAME_CONTENT WHERE DEL_CHECK = "N"
mapper.update: UPDATE GAME_CONTENT SET DEL_CHECK = "N" WHERE GAME_NO = #{game_no}
